text: atarkavarkal, tankal tolkalai nokki, ‘‘enkalukku virotamaka ninkal en catciyam kurinirkal?'' Enru ketparkal. Atarku avai, ‘‘ella porulkalaiyum pecumpati ceykinra allahve enkalaiyum pecumpati ceytan. Avantan unkalai mutal muraiyakavum pataittan. (Iranta) pinnarum ninkal avanitame kontu varappattirukkirirkal'' enrum avai kurum
